snippet: Sori Yanagi, who died on Dec. 25 in Tokyo at the age of 96, designed a vast array of products, from flatware and furniture to cars, subway stations and even the torch for the 1972 Sapporo Winter Olympics.
abstract: Sori Yanagi, who died on Dec. 25 in Tokyo at the age of 96, designed a vast array of products, from flatware and furniture to cars, subway stations and even the torch for the 1972 Sapporo Winter Olympics.

headline.main: Seeing Things | Sori Yanagi's Everyday Beauty
